ack.p: The data sources provided by the Ministry of Home Affairs ( http://censusindia.gov.in/), GoK dashboard ( https://dashboard.kerala.gov.in/index.php), National Vector Borne Disease Control Programme ( https://nvbdcp.gov.in/index.php), and Central Bureau of Health Intelligence ( https://cbhidghs.nic.in/index.php) are acknowledged. The authors would like to take this opportunity to thank the management of VIT for providing the necessary facilities and encouragement to carry out this work. We would like to thank Editage ( www.editage.com) for English language editing.
